about_the_game:
If used during battle, a Shining Pom will appear, raising all attack and support members' levels by 1.

Shining Pom Fruit x3

*Can also be obtained in-game.
*Open [DLC] under the [Item] page in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*Please note that all items in excess of the maximum amount will be lost.
